attributes.action: Bring back youth clubs and harsher sentencing for knife and gun crime.
attributes.additional_details: Most youth services have closed leaving very little for the youths to do. Tougher sentencing for those guilty of knife and gun crime. Bring back Borstal for the young people who have committed serious acts of violence to install discipline and routine.
attributes.background: Gun and knife crime are on the increase, victims are becoming younger and younger. Parents no longer seem to be-able to control their children who are affiliated with gangs and crime. Harsher sentences for those guilty of knife and gun crime.

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/256214
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237702
